Cardiff

23 October 2025

Tickets Sponsors

One Day. One Track. One Community

Speakers

We are excited to bring a number of incredible speakers to Cardiff to share their stories on a range of topics. Although serverless is a theme that will run throughout the day, with recent seismic changes in the software industry, we want to hear about the impact of generative AI, digital sovereignty, cloud financial management and cloud security amongst other themes. We hope to announce speakers following the call for papers covering a variety of areas on different cloud providers.

Venue

After the success of the 2024 edition, ServerlessDays Cardiff will once again be held in the DEPOT

Location: DEPOT, Unit 8 Curran Road (Off Dumballs Road), Cardiff, CF10 5DF
